thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 4 of 522
thread.title: BRANDON MOORE

author: BRANDON MOORE
title: BRANDON MOORE
text: I used other sites to order my contacts and the largest wait was for verification. Not only did they verify my prescription the next day, they found an error on my part and quickly resolved the issue. They shipped the next day. Other places I used took up to a week to verify and shipment took another couple of days, even if you purchased next day delivery!!! So not only are they fast, they are also the cheapest. That's the main reason I checked them out.
